attributes.action: The  MOD set up a more robust system to  diagnose ,monitor and provide care for serving members and veterans of HM Forces  with  PTSD  and  PTS.
attributes.additional_details:
More British soldiers and veterans committed suicide last year than were killed in battle;
This  is a shocking indictment against the MOD  and the politicians, who willing sent those brave souls , at their behest, to fight their political war. They went as ordered, expecting that their employer  held up their part of the contract,  of care for them, should they need it,   they did and their employers are not!!!
'How loud do these PTSD victims have to shout before they are heard, let us all add our shouts  to theirs to ensure those who are responsible cannot fail to hear!!
Do not fail these brave heroes they did not fail you!
We cannot, we must not , we will not allow this to continue.
ENOUGH  IS ENOUGH!!!!!'
DO SOMETHING  NOW!!!
